divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I just saw a UFO hovering around my area of The Bronx. It was a set of four lights, one on each side (top, bottom, left and right). It was hovering around in a zig-zag pattern, and while it was doing this it was making a sort of sound like "looooooo". The two lights on the sides were white, while the top and bottom ones were flashing colors of green, blue, purple, yellow and white. I saw this at around 8:40 PM EST.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around March 20th 2005
